title: Nissan to launch 16 EVs in next three years globally, plans to make India a hub for exports
description: Nissan to introduce three new models in India for exports by 2026. 'The Arc' plan drives competitiveness. Strategic partnerships with Renault and Mitsubishi Motors for global offerings. Manufacturing at Renault Nissan Automotive India Pvt Ltd with 4.8 lakh units annual capacity.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
